Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.cards.exceptions

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidCardException
    This exception is thrown during reading of a card from a file, if the specified file is not correct either syntactically or semantically.
    InvalidRuleEffectException
    This exception is thrown when a problem is found during the scan of a RuleEffect
    InvalidStatementObjectException
    This exception is thrown when a problem is found during the scan of the subject of a RuleStatement
    InvalidStatementSubjectException
    This exception is thrown when a problem is found during the scan of the object of a RuleStatement
